channel.title: Need Bingo'd for Anonymous
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Need Bingo'd for Anonymous"

item.title: Re: Need Bingo'd for Anonymous
item.content:encoded:
Thanks a bunch Quetzalquatl. I've got my bingo now.

This thread may be closed now.

item.title: Re: Need Bingo'd for Anonymous
item.content:encoded:
Thanks a bunch Quetzalquatl.

Of course, that means that I no longer need anyone else to bingo me, so please don't. Except Quetzalquatl, of course.

Again, thanks.

item.title: Re: Need Bingo'd for Anonymous
item.content:encoded: Lear unfortunately the person that could bingo you is out of stamina so you might get it tommorow after dayroll. If you still need it then. Keep me posted

item.title: Re: Need Bingo'd for Anonymous
item.content:encoded: Bingoing multiple people isn't an option (at least not now) because I'm so close to starting the looping timer (about 25k points in Nin, and not much farther in the others) Bingoing 5 people, at 7k a bingo would put me over the top. If I'm getting desperate I can try it later, after the looping timer has started, but not right now. I want to wait another week or so before I start the looping timer.

item.title: Re: Need Bingo'd for Anonymous
item.content:encoded: Can't help ya… unless I can infiltrate my own village and finish you off :P other than that, please gather 5 note pages… and kill high lvl's :)

item.title: Re: Need Bingo'd for Anonymous
item.content:encoded: Giving a gentle bump to this topic as well as mentioning that I was once agin bingo'd sans note page. I still need that bingo if anyone can help me, but no earlier than 9:00 AM Friday Morning

item.title: Re: Need Bingo'd for Anonymous
item.content:encoded:
I was already bingo'd, by coincidence it seems, as the person who did it must not have used a note page (because I did not get anonymous).

So I still do need bingo'd if anyone is willing. However, for the next 11 hours, I'm already bingo'd, so not until at least Tusday, 4:00 AM.

item.title: Re: Need Bingo'd for Anonymous
item.content:encoded:
On second thought, scratch that. No time for me to get into a rival village. Guess you need somebody else's help. Shows my inexperience, it's a good thing these two posts are anonymous…..

Edit: …….*facepalm*

item.title: Re: Need Bingo'd for Anonymous
item.content:encoded: I scored a note page on my final spin at the Party House. Consider yourself bingo'd.

item.title: Need Bingo'd for Anonymous
item.content:encoded:
The title pretty much sums it up. If anyone could bingo me (with a note page, of course) I'd be very grateful.

Of course, I'd be willing to bingo your character in exchange, if you need it.

Anyway, stats at the moment: Lear- The Wiki Village- Level 57- Gen:19 Nin:19 Tai:19

Important: If you can and are willing, post here BEFORE bingoing. If you can't/don't want to post, then just don't bingo me. If I happen to get bingo'd by coincidence or by someone who just didn't care to post here, I'll try to post here as soon as possible to let everyone know. I don't want anyone to get half points/waste 50 stamina bingoing someone who's already bingo'd.

Thanks to anyone who can help.
